fields.name: Operator
fields.description: the operator used to compare the data and the threshold.

fields.name: Threshold
fields.description: the threshold value that activates the alert.

fields.name: TimeAggregation
fields.description: the time aggregation operator. How the data that are collected should be combined over time. The default value is the PrimaryAggregationType of the Metric.

fields.name: WindowSize
fields.description: the period of time (in ISO 8601 duration format) that is used to monitor alert activity based on the threshold. If specified then it must be between 5 minutes and 1 day.
